biotools.summary:
A semi-automated digital image analysis tool for measuring the length of roots and fungal hyphae of dense mycelia.

HyLength: a semi-automated digital image analysis pipeline to measure total fungal hyphal and root lengths.

bioschemas.name: HyLength
